name: Box #175
description:
This 2-drawer box is perfect for jewelry. It is constructed with Hard Maple on the front and back along with Zebra Wood, Ash and Alder in the middle. The drawer pulls have been hand crafted from Black Walnut.
The bottom drawer looks like 2-draws when closed but is actually one large drawer.

This box features one drawer with a removable insert.  These inserts are ideal for organizing things like rings and earrings. If you don’t want to use it, remove it and you have a deep drawer.

The box has a hand rubbed Polyurethane clear finish which brings out the natural beauty of the wood. Both of the drawers have been lined with red plush.

Dimensions:  10” wide, 4 3/4” tall, 5” deep
